org.apache.zookeeper.client
 

  • Uses of ZooKeeperBuilder in org.apache.zookeeper.client

    Methods in org.apache.zookeeper.client that return ZooKeeperBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ZooKeeperBuilder
    ZooKeeperBuilder.withCanBeReadOnly(boolean canBeReadOnly)
    Specifies whether the created client is allowed to go to read-only mode in case of partitioning.
    ZooKeeperBuilder
    ZooKeeperBuilder.withClientConfig(ZKClientConfig clientConfig)
    Specifies the client config used to construct ZooKeeper instances.
    ZooKeeperBuilder
    ZooKeeperBuilder.withDefaultWatcher(Watcher watcher)
    Specified watcher to receive state changes, and node events if attached later.
    ZooKeeperBuilder
    ZooKeeperBuilder.withHostProvider(Function<Collection<InetSocketAddress>,HostProvider> hostProvider)
    Specifies a function to construct a HostProvider with initial server addresses from connect string.
    ZooKeeperBuilder
    ZooKeeperBuilder.withSession(long sessionId, byte[] sessionPasswd)
    Specifies session id and password in session reestablishment.
